enumerators.name: kImageViewAppearanceColorize
enumerators.brief: (appearance) fill with backcolor/forecolor depending on select parameter or colorize background image

enumerators.name: kImageViewAppearanceFitImage
enumerators.brief: (appearance) fit image proportionally and select best resolution

enumerators.name: kImageViewAppearanceAllowStretch
enumerators.brief: (appearance) allow to stretch image, requires fit option

enumerators.name: kImageViewAppearanceAllowZoom
enumerators.brief: (appearance) allow to zoom image, requires fit option

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorSelectOnClick
enumerators.brief: (behavior) select when clicked

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorFramesByName
enumerators.brief: (behavior) interpret string of select parameter as frame name in background image

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorWindowSizable
enumerators.brief: (behavior) user can resize window by clicking in border areas

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorWindowMovable
enumerators.brief: (behavior) user can move window by clicking in view

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorWindowMaximize
enumerators.brief: (behavior) user can maximize window with double click

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorInsertData
enumerators.brief: (behavior) IDataTarget::insertData() will be called even if there is a custom drag handler

enumerators.name: kImageViewLayoutIgnoreImageSize
enumerators.brief: (layout) don't auto-size to background image when initial size is empty

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorSwallowMouseClick
enumerators.brief: (behavior) don't allow parents to perform mouse clicks, e.g. to suppress drag operation

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorSwallowMouseWheel
enumerators.brief: (behavior) don't allow parents to perform mouse wheel

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorBackgroundLayer
enumerators.brief: (behavior) create graphics layer for background image

enumerators.name: kImageViewAppearanceHighQuality
enumerators.brief: (appearance) use high quality image interpolation mode

enumerators.name: kImageViewLayoutHFitImageSize
enumerators.brief: (layout) auto-size view to width of current image

enumerators.name: kImageViewAppearanceCenterImage
enumerators.brief: (appearance) center image

enumerators.name: kImageViewBehaviorDisable
enumerators.brief: (behavior) disable view, i.e. don't allow children to perform any edits

enumerators.name: kVariantViewBehaviorBoundValue
enumerators.brief: (behavior) always create child view even if numeric parameter is out of bounds

enumerators.name: kVariantViewBehaviorSelectAlways
enumerators.brief: (behavior) always rebuild child view, even if index did not change

enumerators.name: kVariantViewBehaviorInvert
enumerators.brief: (behavior) invert value of associated parameter

enumerators.name: kVariantViewLayoutUnifySizes
enumerators.brief: (layout) when switching views, pass width / height of previous view to new view, depending on options, i.e. horizontal for width, vertical for height

enumerators.name: kVariantViewLayoutFill
enumerators.brief: (layout) child views always get full client area of variant view (can be used for optimization as other views don't need to be resized)

enumerators.name: kItemViewAppearanceHeader
enumerators.brief: (appearance) show column headers above item view

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorSelection
enumerators.brief: (behavior) enable selection of items

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorSelectExclusive
enumerators.brief: (behavior) only one item can be selected at a time

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorAutoSelect
enumerators.brief: (behavior) automatically select item under mouse

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorNoDrag
enumerators.brief: (behavior) don't allow to drag items

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorNoRubberband
enumerators.brief: (behavior) don't allow to start a rubberband selection

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorNoDoubleClick
enumerators.brief: (behavior) don't wait for doubleclicks

enumerators.name: kItemViewAppearanceNoFocusRect
enumerators.brief: (appearance) don't draw focus rectangle around item

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorColumnFocus
enumerators.brief: (behavior) limit focus rectangle to focussed column

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorFocusSelectable
enumerators.brief: (behavior) only selectable items can be focussed

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorSelectFullWidth
enumerators.brief: (behavior) draw selection using full available width, ignoring title width

enumerators.name: kItemViewAppearanceRedrawOnResize
enumerators.brief: (appearance) redraw item view on resize (use if data is drawn right-aligned or centered)

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorSwallowAlphaChars
enumerators.brief: (behavior) swallow key events with alphabetical characters (when name navigation fails)

enumerators.name: kItemViewAppearanceThumbnails
enumerators.brief: (appearance) show item thumbnails

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorDragSwipeH
enumerators.brief: (behavior) start dragging the touched item on a horizontal swipe gesture (with high priority)

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorDragSwipeV
enumerators.brief: (behavior) start dragging the touched item on a vertical swipe gesture (with high priority)

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorNoUnselect
enumerators.brief: (behavior) don't unselect items on click in empty area

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorNoNameNavigation
enumerators.brief: (behavior) suppress name navigation (which steals key commands sometimes)

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorNoContextMenu
enumerators.brief: (behavior) suppress context menu

enumerators.name: kItemViewBehaviorSimpleMouse
enumerators.brief: (behavior) combined option: no drag, no rubberband, no doubleclick

enumerators.name: kTreeViewAppearanceNoRoot
enumerators.brief: (appearance) hide tree root item

enumerators.name: kTreeViewAppearanceNoIcons
enumerators.brief: (appearance) hide tree item icons

enumerators.name: kTreeViewBehaviorAutoExpand
enumerators.brief: (behavior) automatically expand selected item

enumerators.name: kTreeViewBehaviorExpandAll
enumerators.brief: (behavior) automatically expand all items (no collapse possible)

enumerators.name: kTreeViewBehaviorExpandMouseItem
enumerators.brief: (behavior) automatically expand item under mouse after short delay

enumerators.name: kTreeViewBehaviorExpandDragItem
enumerators.brief: (behavior) automatically expand item under mouse when dragging

enumerators.name: kListViewAppearanceDontClipCells
enumerators.brief: (appearance) cells are allowed to draw outside their cell rectangle

enumerators.name: kListViewAppearanceNoLineBreak
enumerators.brief: (appearance) no line break in icon mode, all icons are placed in one row

enumerators.name: kListViewAppearanceExtendLastColumn
enumerators.brief: (appearance) extend last column to right edge of view

enumerators.name: kListViewBehaviorSwipeToFocus
enumerators.brief: (behavior) swipe to focus item under touch (like auto-select behavior for mouse)

enumerators.name: kListViewAppearanceAutoSizeItems
enumerators.brief: (appearance) auto-size list items to fill the available horizontal space

enumerators.name: kListViewAppearanceNoDefaultIcon
enumerators.brief: (appearance) explicitly hide the default icon

enumerators.name: kListViewAppearanceAutoCenterIcons
enumerators.brief: (appearance) auto-center list items to fill the available horizontal space

enumerators.name: kListViewBehaviorNavigateFlat
enumerators.brief: (behavior) interpret 'Up' / 'Down' and 'Left' / 'Right' commands as 'previous / next item' (no spatial navigation, can be useful with switchable view types)

enumerators.name: kListViewAppearanceDrawCustomItem
enumerators.brief: (appearance) application model draws customized item (not the framework)

enumerators.name: kListViewAppearanceCenterRows
enumerators.brief: (appearance) center rows in list view

enumerators.name: kDropBoxLayoutWrapViews
enumerators.brief: (layout) views that don't fit in the container are wrapped to a new row

enumerators.name: kDropBoxBehaviorDragNowhereToRemove
enumerators.brief: (behavior) items that are dragged to a place where they cannot be handled are removed

enumerators.name: kDropBoxBehaviorScrollWheel
enumerators.brief: (behavior) enable mousewheel scrolling (can be unpleasant if child views also handle the wheel, e.g. controls)

enumerators.name: kDropBoxLayoutAlignEnd
enumerators.brief: (layout) align views at right (horizontal) or bottom (vertical) of DropBox instead of left / top

enumerators.name: kDropBoxAppearanceColorize
enumerators.brief: (appearance) fill with background color

enumerators.name: kDropBoxLayoutCentered
enumerators.brief: (layout) views are centered inside the dropbox

enumerators.name: kDropBoxLayoutAutoResize
enumerators.brief: (layout) dropbox height is resized to content when views are wrapped

enumerators.name: kDropBoxLayoutCommonBaseSize
enumerators.brief: (layout) layout is calculated based on a common initial size for all views

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorFloating
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window is in floating layer

enumerators.name: kWindowAppearanceTitleBar
enumerators.brief: (appearance) window has a title bar

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorSizable
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window has a sizable border

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorMaximizable
enumerators.brief: (behavior) windows can be maximized

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorTopMost
enumerators.brief: (behavior) windows is above other applications

enumerators.name: kWindowAppearanceDropShadow
enumerators.brief: (appearance) window has a shadow effect

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorCenter
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window is shown centered

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorInflate
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window size should be inflated to fill the main monitor

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorAutoSeeThru
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window is half-transparent when inactive

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorPopupSelector
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window that is used by the popup selector, needs to be above anything else

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorRestoreSize
enumerators.brief: (behavior) restore last known window size

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorRestorePosition
enumerators.brief: (behavior) restore last known window position

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorRestoreCenter
enumerators.brief: (behavior) restore last known window center position

enumerators.name: kWindowPrivateFlagRestored
enumerators.brief: (private flag) true if window size/position was restored

enumerators.name: kWindowAppearanceCustomFrame
enumerators.brief: (appearance) window has a custom frame

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorIntermediate
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window is below floating windows and above base layer windows

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorProgressDialog
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window is used as progress dialog

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorTooltip
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window is used as tooltip

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorPluginViewHost
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window hosts foreign views

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorFullscreen
enumerators.brief: (behavior) window can enter fullscreen mode

enumerators.name: kWindowBehaviorSheetStyle
enumerators.brief: (behavior) sheet presentation (not available on all platforms)

enumerators.name: kWindowAppearanceRoundedCorners
enumerators.brief: (appearance) window with custom frame can have rounded corners (not available on all platforms)

enumerators.name: kWindowCombinedStyleDefault
enumerators.brief: default window style: title bar

enumerators.name: kWindowCombinedStyleSizable
enumerators.brief: sizable, maximizable window

enumerators.name: kWindowCombinedStylePanel
enumerators.brief: panel window style: title bar, floating

enumerators.name: kWindowCombinedStyleDialog
enumerators.brief: default dialog window style: title bar, centered

enumerators.name: kLayoutReverse
enumerators.brief: start placing views at right (bottom) edge

enumerators.name: kLayoutUnifySizes
enumerators.brief: try to give all views the same height (horizontal) or width (vertical)

enumerators.name: kLayoutWrap
enumerators.brief: views that don't fit in the container are wrapped to a new row

enumerators.name: kLayoutHidePriority
enumerators.brief: views that don't fit in the container are hidden, lowest priority first

enumerators.name: kLayoutNoMinLimit
enumerators.brief: layout view reports 0 as minimum width (height), ignoring the value calculated from child views

enumerators.name: kLayoutAdaptive
enumerators.brief: views get a chance to constrain the proposed size via View::constrainSize ()

enumerators.name: kLayoutCommonBaseSize
enumerators.brief: layout is calculated based on a common initial size for all views (updated when a view changes its size)

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorMaster
enumerators.brief: in a group of dividers synced to the same parameter, this divider takes some extra care of syncing the fellow dividers to the parameter

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorSlave
enumerators.brief: in a group of dividers synced to the same parameter, this divider does not modify the parameter when it moves

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorReverse
enumerators.brief: the parameter value refers to the distance of the divider from the parent's bottom / right instead of top / left (default)

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorOutreachLeft
enumerators.brief: the divider's outreach (if defined) should only be applied to the left neighbor

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorOutreachRight
enumerators.brief: the divider's outreach (if defined) should only be applied to the right neighbor

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorOutreachTop
enumerators.brief: the divider's outreach (if defined) should only be applied to the top neighbor

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorOutreachBottom
enumerators.brief: the divider's outreach (if defined) should only be applied to the bottom neighbor

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorChildrenOnTop
enumerators.brief: divider can have children on top

enumerators.name: kDividerBehaviorPush
enumerators.brief: when the divider can't be moved further, it tries to 'push' another near divider to make room

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorImmediate
enumerators.brief: (behavior) parameter is changed on mouse down instead of mouse up

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorSwipe
enumerators.brief: (behavior) mouse can be dragged over horizontal or vertical row of buttons with the same name (from different controllers) to switch them all to the same value as the first clicked button

enumerators.name: kButtonLayoutIgnoreImageSize
enumerators.brief: (layout) background image size is ignored when auto-sizing the button, only title size is used

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorSilentTracking
enumerators.brief: (behavior) instead of changing the paramter value, a special preview handler is used

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorSlide
enumerators.brief: (behavior) instead of a simple click, the button can be slided to its new state (dragging the mouse). An additional 'slide' image is used during this manipulation. It should have one frame per button state and an equal number of intermediate frames between them.

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorMomentary
enumerators.brief: (behavior) parameter is changed on mouse down. In case of toggle buttons, the parameter change is just momentary (i.e. does not latch) if the button is pressed longer

enumerators.name: kButtonAppearanceMultiLine
enumerators.brief: (appearance) button title will be drawn with wordwrap, requires button width to be set

enumerators.name: kButtonAppearanceHideFocus
enumerators.brief: (appearance) don't draw focus rectangle

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorIntermediate
enumerators.brief: (behavior) parameter is changed on mouse down and back on mouse up

enumerators.name: kButtonAppearanceLeadingIcon
enumerators.brief: (appearance) icon sticks to the left with respect to given padding

enumerators.name: kButtonAppearanceTrailingIcon
enumerators.brief: (appearance) icon sticks to the right with respect to given padding

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorPassive
enumerators.brief: (behavior) button is used as passive control, i.e. mouse clicks fall thru

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorNeedsOptionKey
enumerators.brief: (behavior) button only responds to mouse/touch input when the option key is pressed (multiple modifier requirements can be combined)

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorNeedsCommandKey
enumerators.brief: (behavior) button only responds to mouse/touch input when the command key is pressed

enumerators.name: kButtonBehaviorNeedsShiftKey
enumerators.brief: (behavior) button only responds to mouse/touch input when the shift key is pressed

enumerators.name: kButtonAppearanceScaleText
enumerators.brief: (appearance) button uses a dynamic font size to fill the available space

enumerators.name: kToggleBehaviorInvertParam
enumerators.brief: parameter is inverted

enumerators.name: kMultiToggleBehaviorDecrement
enumerators.brief: parameter is decremented on push

enumerators.name: kCheckBoxBehaviorTriState
enumerators.brief: checkbox has three states: off, mixed, on

enumerators.name: kRadioButtonBehaviorToggle
enumerators.brief: parameter is set to min if radio value is already set

enumerators.name: kToolButtonBehaviorNoWheel
enumerators.brief: no mousewheel

enumerators.name: kToolButtonAppearanceFixedIcon
enumerators.brief: no mode icons are shown

enumerators.name: kToolButtonBehaviorModeToggle
enumerators.brief: like toggle option - use when mode parameter is equal to control parameter without off state

enumerators.name: kUpDownButtonBehaviorIncrement
enumerators.brief: button increments parameter value

enumerators.name: kUpDownButtonBehaviorDecrement
enumerators.brief: button decrements parameter value

enumerators.name: kLinkViewAppearanceButton
enumerators.brief: link draws as button

enumerators.name: kLinkViewAppearanceFitTitle
enumerators.brief: fit title to display width

enumerators.name: kLinkViewAppearanceTitleAsUrl
enumerators.brief: title is the url

enumerators.name: kTextBoxAppearanceMultiLine
enumerators.brief: multiline text

enumerators.name: kTextBoxAppearanceFitText
enumerators.brief: fit text to display width

enumerators.name: kTextBoxBehaviorNoContextMenu
enumerators.brief: suppress context menu

enumerators.name: kTextBoxAppearanceScaleText
enumerators.brief: uses a dynamic font size to fill the available space

enumerators.name: kTextBoxAppearanceMarkupEnabled
enumerators.brief: interpret text markup

enumerators.name: kTextBoxBehaviorPasswordEdit
enumerators.brief: password-style editing

enumerators.name: kTextBoxBehaviorDoubleClickEdit
enumerators.brief: edit only if double-clicked

enumerators.name: kReturnKeyDefault
enumerators.brief: platform default, for example 'Return'

enumerators.name: kReturnKeyGo
enumerators.brief: 'Go'

enumerators.name: kReturnKeyNext
enumerators.brief: 'Next'

enumerators.name: kReturnKeySearch
enumerators.brief: 'Search'

enumerators.name: kReturnKeySend
enumerators.brief: 'Send'

enumerators.name: kReturnKeyDone
enumerators.brief: 'Done'

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypeAutomatic
enumerators.brief: input field type derived from parameter type

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypeGeneric
enumerators.brief: default input field

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypeEmail
enumerators.brief: email address input field

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypeUrl
enumerators.brief: URL input field

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypePhoneNumber
enumerators.brief: phone number input field

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypeNumeric
enumerators.brief: numeric input field

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypeNumericSigned
enumerators.brief: numeric input field for signed values

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypeDecimal
enumerators.brief: input field with decimal point

enumerators.name: kKeyboardTypeDecimalSigned
enumerators.brief: input field for signed decimal values

enumerators.name: kAutofillTypeNone
enumerators.brief: not defined (default)

enumerators.name: kAutofillTypeUsername
enumerators.brief: user account or login name

enumerators.name: kAutofillTypeEmail
enumerators.brief: email address

enumerators.name: kAutofillTypePassword
enumerators.brief: password

enumerators.name: kAutofillTypeNewPassword
enumerators.brief: new password

enumerators.name: kAutofillTypeFirstName
enumerators.brief: first name

enumerators.name: kAutofillTypeLastName
enumerators.brief: last name

enumerators.name: kAutofillTypeCountry
enumerators.brief: country or region name

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorDialogEdit
enumerators.brief: edit has dialog behavior

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorMustHitText
enumerators.brief: on mouseclick, edit only if the text was hit

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorImmediate
enumerators.brief: parameter gets updates while editing

enumerators.name: kEditBoxAppearanceHideText
enumerators.brief: do not display text

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorNoWheel
enumerators.brief: no mousewheel

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorNoSuggestions
enumerators.brief: no text suggestions

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorNoClearButton
enumerators.brief: no clear button (X)

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorExtended
enumerators.brief: use framework editing implementation instead of native text control (regardless of global configuration)

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorDragText
enumerators.brief: drag a text selection to another position to cut and paste it

enumerators.name: kEditBoxBehaviorPermanentCaret
enumerators.brief: show caret permanently when not focused

enumerators.name: kEditBoxAppearanceOpaqueEdit
enumerators.brief: draw background while editing, even if the control is transparent

enumerators.name: kValueBoxBehaviorNoDrag
enumerators.brief: drag events can be handled by controls beneath.

enumerators.name: kValueBoxBehaviorXYEdit
enumerators.brief: use xyediting with a default sensitivity of 200 points and set the vertical size cursor immediately

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxAppearanceHideText
enumerators.brief: do not display text

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxAppearanceHideFocus
enumerators.brief: don't draw focus rectangle

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxAppearanceHideButton
enumerators.brief: don't draw the select button

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxBehaviorIgnoreKeys
enumerators.brief: ignore arrow keys (when menu closed); Option+Up/Down is still handled to open the menu

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxBehaviorInverseWheel
enumerators.brief: inverse mousewheel direction

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxBehaviorStayOpenOnClick
enumerators.brief: popup stays open on single click on an item, closes on doubleclick

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxAppearanceLeadingButton
enumerators.brief: draw the select button on left hand side from the text

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxAppearanceTrailingButton
enumerators.brief: draw the select button on right hand side even when no text is displayed (hidetext)

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxAppearanceOffState
enumerators.brief: draw the first item as it is in off state

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxBehaviorNoWheel
enumerators.brief: no mousewheel

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxBehaviorNoModifier
enumerators.brief: mouse down events with modifiers are ignored

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxAppearanceHideImage
enumerators.brief: hide the image taken from the visualStyle 'states' image or the parameter, in case it is an imageprovider

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxAppearanceTitleAsText
enumerators.brief: show view title instead of parameter value

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxBehaviorDragOpen
enumerators.brief: defer opening the menu until mouse is dragged / swipe is detected

enumerators.name: kSelectBoxBehaviorCloseMenu
enumerators.brief: close menu when mouse/touch is outside, even when nothing was selected

enumerators.name: kDialogGroupAppearancePrimary
enumerators.brief: primary dialog group

enumerators.name: kDialogGroupAppearanceSecondary
enumerators.brief: secondary dialog group

enumerators.name: kSliderModeTouch
enumerators.brief: slider handle must be hit

enumerators.name: kSliderModeJump
enumerators.brief: slider handle is allowed to jump

enumerators.name: kSliderModeRelative
enumerators.brief: slider can be hit anywhere; handle does not jump but moves relatively

enumerators.name: kSliderAppearanceThinHandle
enumerators.brief: draw thin handle

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorEditTooltip
enumerators.brief: show value tooltip while editing

enumerators.name: kSliderAppearanceBarGraph
enumerators.brief: draw bar graph

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorGlobalMode
enumerators.brief: follow global slider mode

enumerators.name: kSliderAppearanceCentered
enumerators.brief: draw centered bargraph (like bipolar param)

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorReverse
enumerators.brief: draw reversed value (like reverse param)

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorSwipe
enumerators.brief: swipe with right mouse button to copy value to related sliders

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorNoTouchReset
enumerators.brief: don't reset slider via touch input

enumerators.name: kSliderAppearanceTickScale
enumerators.brief: draw tick scale in slider (requires a IParamCurve that provides the ITickScale interface)

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorXYEdit
enumerators.brief: xy editing - enables vertical mouse movements for horizontal sliders and vice versa

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorOptionClick
enumerators.brief: slider notifies controller on option+click

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorResetClick
enumerators.brief: slider notifies controller on reset click

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorDoubleTap
enumerators.brief: slider notifies controller on double tap instead of parameter reset

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorNoWheel
enumerators.brief: no mousewheel

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorPassive
enumerators.brief: slider is used as passive control - mouse clicks fall through

enumerators.name: kSliderBehaviorInverseWheel
enumerators.brief: inverse mousewheel direction

enumerators.name: kSliderAppearanceDefaultCentered
enumerators.brief: default value is used as center value for bargraph style

enumerators.name: kKnobAppearanceFilmstrip
enumerators.brief: 'background' image should be used as a filmstrip

enumerators.name: kKnobAppearanceCircle
enumerators.brief: a partial circle around the center is drawn

enumerators.name: kKnobAppearanceIndicator
enumerators.brief: a line from the center to the end of the circle is drawn

enumerators.name: kKnobBehaviorEndlessDial
enumerators.brief: knob works as an endless dial

enumerators.name: kRangeSliderBehaviorValidate
enumerators.brief: external value changes will be validated (first value cannot be above second value)

enumerators.name: kRangeSliderBehaviorLimit
enumerators.brief: lower and upper limits for value changes defined by boundaries

enumerators.name: kRangeSliderBehaviorInvertible
enumerators.brief: first value can be above second value - not compatible with 'validate'

enumerators.name: kColorBoxBehaviorNoWheel
enumerators.brief: no mousewheel

enumerators.name: kSwipeBoxBehaviorNoWheel
enumerators.brief: no mousewheel

enumerators.name: kSwipeBoxBehaviorIgnoreName
enumerators.brief: target controls don't have to match name of start control

enumerators.name: kSwipeBoxBehaviorIgnoreTag
enumerators.brief: target controls don't have to match tag of start control

enumerators.name: kScrollPickerBehaviorWrapAround
enumerators.brief: no stops at min or max - the value is wrapped around when exceeding min/max

enumerators.name: kScrollPickerAppearanceFlatBarrel
enumerators.brief: barrel appears to be flat

enumerators.name: kScrollPickerAppearanceDigitMode
enumerators.brief: the renderer uses single digit-bitmaps for integer parameters (no wrap- or flat-mode support)

enumerators.name: kScrollPickerAppearanceHideImage
enumerators.brief: disable carousel mode for images

enumerators.name: kPlugInViewBehaviorFocus
enumerators.brief: plug-in view takes focus when it's activated

enumerators.name: kTriVectorPadBehaviorKeepLevel
enumerators.brief: combined levels are remembered - only parameter ratios change. (i.e. initial full scale state of all three parameters is reset when moving the handle back to center)

enumerators.name: kTriVectorPadAppearanceUpsideDown
enumerators.brief: triangle is upside down

enumerators.name: kTriVectorPadBehaviorTooltip
enumerators.brief: show tooltip values

enumerators.name: kTriVectorPadBehaviorInvert
enumerators.brief: parameter is inverted

enumerators.name: kWebBrowserViewBehaviorRestrictToLocal
enumerators.brief: restrict to local pages only
